goal: Taxify is the best way to move in European cities. Taxify connects riders to drivers via our mobile and web applications. We create flexible opportunities for drivers to earn extra income and provide reliable verified drivers for riders. Taxify founded 2013 in Estonia and today operates over 25 cities in 18+ countries. As European company, we pay local taxes, create thousands of new jobs and build the next European transport industry leader.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Internal Market policy; Innovation policy; Digital Single Market; Jobs & Competition policy; Urban transportation; Mobility; Autonomous Cars
